Class HttpCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.HttpCommunicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceXMLCommunicator
public class HttpCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceXMLCommunicator

Send and receive requests through HTTP or HTTPS, with none, basic or certificate authentication.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.09.27.

receive

public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement> receive(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement request,
                                                                                                            hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler scheduler)
Description copied from interface: AdvanceXMLCommunicator
Receive XML responses continuously. The returned data should be a complete XML, but its parsing is done per each of the root's children, e.g., an XML of <a><b/><b/></a> will produce two b elements. Observers should throw a CancellationException to stop the reception

Specified by:
receive in interface AdvanceXMLCommunicator
Parameters:
request - the request to send the response messages or exceptions
scheduler - where the blocking wait occurs
Returns:
the closeable to terminate the streaming
